snippet.title: Samorost 1 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Samorost 1 is out now for the first time as a FREE downloadable game! Available on PC, Mac, iOS and Android.

Explore the beginnings of the Samorost series in the space gnome’s original bite-sized adventure, formerly released in 2003. Now with remastered sounds, enhanced graphics, and new music by Floex.

Samorost 1 by Amanita Design:
https://amanita-design.net/games/samorost-1.html

Samorost 1 on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1580970/Samorost_1/
